description.translate: I've come face to face with myself, man sanctify the early light just like the old man can, boy

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Faire face\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Je me suis retrouvé face à face avec moi-même, mec\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Sanctifie la lumière du matin comme le vieil homme sait, mon garçon\"}","{\"text\":\"§7I've come face to face with myself, man\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Sanctify the early light just like the old man can, boy\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a3 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
